step_heading: Apna Niche aur Market Tay Karain
text: Sabse pehle yeh decide karein ke aap kya bechna chahte hain aur Dubai market mein kis cheez ki demand hai. Google Trends aur Facebook Ad Library aapki madad kar sakte hain.
Ek acha supplier dhundna bohat zaroori hai. Zafan Dropshipping jaise platforms check karein jo sourcing, shipping aur returns sab manage karte hain.
Shopify pe apna store banana bohat easy hai.  Aap isko easily customize kar sakte hain aur 30 minutes mein setup kar sakte hain.
International dropshipping ke liye payment gateway bohat important hai. Zafan Dropshipping aapko kai options deta hai, jaise credit cards, Pakistani bank accounts aur PayPal.
Marketing bohat zaroori hai sales lane ke liye. Facebook Ads ya TikTok Ads use kar sakte hain. Facebook Ads zyada affordable hai.
